manifest.changelog:
-Upgraded the video note length to 60 seconds.
-Now you can zoom on stories again.
-Added a shortcut to create notes for posts.
-Brought back the seekbar in the reels in both the Feed and the Reels tab.
-Added an Edit grid option in the profile so you can reorder your grid (not working yet as the option is not clickable, might work in future versions).
-Minor changes and fixes.
manifest.description: Yeah, most popular backup in the world!
